divs: Sighting Detailson the above mentioned date and at the above mentioned time, i was at my parents house. we had been watching television. since it was a warm night, i decided to step out onto the porch. i happened to look to my left at the mountains, which are north of my parents house about maybe a few hundred yards. above the mountains, i noticed a large, triangle shaped object with lights on the vertices, and two smaller ball shaped lights a short distance behind it, hovering over the mountain.this of course was quite unsettling. at first i thought these were the lights of a plane or other aircraft, but the absence of sound ruled that out. as i watched, the object began to glide slowly in a southerly direction, the two trailing lights followed at the same pace. i stood there and watched these objects until they traversed the valleya and dissapeared beyond the mountains on the other side of the valley.
trends: There have been 78 other sightings in Oklahoma City
There were no other sightings in Oklahoma City on or around April 30th 1991
Summary: i stepped out onto my parents porch, looked up at the mountain and saw an object hovering over the mountain
